VIEW_DASHBOARD.name: View Dashboard
VIEW_DASHBOARD.description: Allows the user to view the instance dashboard.

MANAGE_USERS.name: Manage Users
MANAGE_USERS.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and remove users from the instance.

MANAGE_INSTANCES.name: Manage Instances
MANAGE_INSTANCES.description: Allows the user to create, edit, and remove instances.

VIEW_REPORTS.name: View Reports
VIEW_REPORTS.description: Allows the user to view instance reports.
